examples.korean: He was pronounced brain-dead. 발음듣기 그는 뇌사 판정을 받았다 Neungyule
My father has been brain dead since the traffic accident. 발음듣기 아버지는 교통사고 후 줄곧 뇌사 상태에 있다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My father has been brain dead since the traffic accident. 발음

examples.korean: The nose, lip and chin donated for the face transplant in France came from a woman who had been declared brain-dead. 발음듣기 프랑스에서의 안면이식을 위해 기증된 코, 입술, 턱은 뇌 사 상태로 판명된 한 여성으로부터 왔다. Neungyule
examples.english: The nose, lip and chin donated for the face transplant in France came from a woman who had been declared brain-dead. 발음

examples.korean: If a healthy baby is born, the case could be longest of the world's few such treatments of brain-dead women. 발음듣기 만약에 건강한 아기가 태어난다면, 이 경우는 뇌사한 여인이 세계적으로 드문 가장 긴 기간동안 치료를 받은 경우가 될 것이다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If a healthy baby is born, the case could be longest of the world's few such treatments of brain-dead women. 발음

examples.korean: Kim's doctors added that she had some very limited brain activity about once a day that kept her from being declared brain dead. 발음듣기 김씨의 의사들은, 그녀가 하루에 한 번 정도 아주 제한된 약간의 뇌 활동을 하고 있는데, 이것 때문에 뇌사 판정을 하지 못하고 있다고 덧붙였다. Neungyule
examples.english: Kim's doctors added that she had some very limited brain activity about once a day that kept her from being declared brain dead. 발음
